channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HBASE-13432] TestRegionSplitPolicy.testIncreasingToUpperBoundRegionSplitPolicy is flapping on branch-1
item.description:
Noticed this test failing on recent jenkins builds (https://builds.apache.org/job/HBase-1.1/377/)

Stacktrace



java.lang.AssertionError: null

	at org.junit.Assert.fail(Assert.java:86)

	at org.junit.Assert.assertTrue(Assert.java:41)

	at org.junit.Assert.assertTrue(Assert.java:52)

	at org.apache.hadoop.hbase.regionserver.TestRegionSplitPolicy.testIncreasingToUpperBoundRegionSplitPolicy(TestRegionSplitPolicy.java:114)



Standard Output



2015-04-08 05:40:55,026 INFO  [main] hbase.ResourceChecker(147): before: regionserver.TestRegionSplitPolicy#testIncreasingToUpperBoundRegionSplitPolicy Thread=4, OpenFileDescriptor=184, MaxFileDescriptor=60000, SystemLoadAverage=239, ProcessCount=310, AvailableMemoryMB=16291, ConnectionCount=0

2015-04-08 05:40:55,801 DEBUG [main] regionserver.IncreasingToUpperBoundRegionSplitPolicy(85): ShouldSplit because null size=2000, sizeToCheck=1137, regionsWithCommonTable=0

2015-04-08 05:40:55,804 DEBUG [main] regionserver.IncreasingToUpperBoundRegionSplitPolicy(85): ShouldSplit because null size=2000, sizeToCheck=1137, regionsWithCommonTable=0

2015-04-08 05:40:55,805 DEBUG [main] regionserver.IncreasingToUpperBoundRegionSplitPolicy(85): ShouldSplit because null size=257, sizeToCheck=256, regionsWithCommonTable=1

2015-04-08 05:40:55,827 INFO  [main] hbase.ResourceChecker(171): after: regionserver.TestRegionSplitPolicy#testIncreasingToUpperBoundRegionSplitPolicy Thread=5 (was 4)

Potentially hanging thread: process reaper

	sun.misc.Unsafe.park(Native Method)

	java.util.concurrent.locks.LockSupport.parkNanos(LockSupport.java:226)

	java.util.concurrent.SynchronousQueue$TransferStack.awaitFulfill(SynchronousQueue.java:460)

	java.util.concurrent.SynchronousQueue$TransferStack.transfer(SynchronousQueue.java:359)

	java.util.concurrent.SynchronousQueue.poll(SynchronousQueue.java:942)

	java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor.getTask(ThreadPoolExecutor.java:1068)

	java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor.runWorker(ThreadPoolExecutor.java:1130)

	java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker.run(ThreadPoolExecutor.java:615)

	java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:744)

 - Thread LEAK? -, OpenFileDescriptor=185 (was 184) - OpenFileDescriptor LEAK? -, MaxFileDescriptor=60000 (was 60000), SystemLoadAverage=239 (was 239), ProcessCount=310 (was 310), AvailableMemoryMB=16142 (was 16291), ConnectionCount=0 (was 0)

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: Looks like this will be resolved via addendum on HBASE-13412.
